sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"愉快，快乐，高兴"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: pleasure, delight, rapture, enjoyment, joy, fun
means: pleasure ： 最普通常用词，常指不表露出来的满意或喜悦情绪，也指强烈的愉快或兴奋感。
delight ： 指强烈的、活泼的、显而易见的快乐和高兴。
rapture ： 书面语用词，指极端的欣喜、大喜或狂喜。
enjoyment比pleasure, joy和delight的语气轻，但更着重行为或乐事的本身，而不是感情。
joy ： 语气弱于rapture，强于pleasure，多指情感充溢，喜形于色的强烈的欢乐情绪。
fun ： 普通用词，指任何能给予喜悦的娱乐，或指娱乐本身。

sentence.Network_en: It was a joy to see. It really made my day.
sentence.Network_cn: 这太有趣了，真的把我高兴坏了。

sentence.Network_en: Gregory was still enchanted with Shannon's youth and joy and beauty.
sentence.Network_cn: 格雷戈里仍为香农的朝气、快乐和美丽着迷。

sentence.Network_en: He jumped for joy on being told the news.
sentence.Network_cn: 得知这个消息，他高兴得手舞足蹈。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French joie, based on Latin gaudium, from gaudere 'rejoice'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 JOY，这个名字就是一个传奇。这款独一无二的香水造就了JEAN PATOU最伟大的香水屋的地位，更使 JEANPATOU的名字跨越年代而成为永恒。 1929年华尔街大崩盘后，JEAN PATOU 那些曾经一掷千金的朋友及客人也无一例外地受到萧条经济的冲击。JEAN PATOU在这一片愁云惨雾中要求其调香师亨利·阿尔梅拉调制出一种与众不同、雅致华丽又经典永恒的香水以作为礼物呈现给他尊贵的客人。 经过无数次的尝试，他们被一款全新的配方所深深吸引

entry.def: Joy is a feeling of great happiness.

entry.tran: 令人高兴的事（或人）；乐事；乐趣
entry.def: A joy is something or someone that makes you feel happy or gives you great pleasure.

example.ex: One can never learn all there is to know about cooking, and that is one of the joys of being a chef...
example.tran: 钻研烹饪之道是永无止境的，这也是当厨师的乐趣之一。

example.ex: It was a joy to see her looking so well.
example.tran: 看到她气色这么好真叫人高兴。

entry.def: If you get no joy, you do not have success or luck in achieving what you are trying to do.

example.ex: They expect no joy from the vote itself...
example.tran: 他们对投票本身不抱任何希望。

example.ex: If you don't get any joy, get in touch with your local councillor.
example.tran: 如果你没得到任何结果，请和本地议员联系。

entry.def: If you say that someone is jumping for joy, you mean that they are very pleased or happy about something.

example.ex: He jumped for joy on being told the news.
example.tran: 得知这个消息，他高兴得手舞足蹈。

means.word_mean: 2. something or someone that provides pleasure; a source of happiness;

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的, 兴高彩烈的, 可喜的, 令人欢欣的
stems_affixes.word_buile: joy欢乐,高兴+ful……的→adj.快乐的, 兴高彩烈的, 可喜的, 令人欢欣的
joy欢乐,高兴→n.欢乐,喜悦;乐事,乐趣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 享受……的乐趣, 欣赏, 喜爱
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+joy欢乐,高兴→v.享受……的乐趣, 欣赏, 喜爱 v.满意

Sentence.sentence: The joy of a recession means no argument next year - we just won't go.

sentences.en: When his wish was realized, his joy knew no measure.
sentences.cn: 当他的愿望实现时, 他不知道有多高兴。

sentences.en: This dramatic work has been a great joy.
sentences.cn: 这激动人心的工作是件使人非常高兴的事。

jushi.english: Her evident joy at his return somewhat embarrassed him.
jushi.chinese: 一见到他回来,她就喜形于色,这使他有点不好意思。

jushi.english: An exclamation of joy escaped from her lips.
jushi.chinese: 她情不自禁地发出了一声高兴的叫喊声。

jushi.english: He experienced a joy in helping others in trouble.
jushi.chinese: 他领受到了那种帮助困难人之后的快乐。
